name: uniwork_back
description:
Primary, stable branch in the repository. Final stage.
Protected by: **pull requests**, **peer review rules**, **automated tests**.
All changes are merged here only after passing the review stage on `dev` branch.
author: Francisco Ithurriague

scripts.session:db: docker exec -it uniwork_db psql -U uniwork_backend_user -d uniwork
scripts.migrate:up: docker exec -it uniwork_server npx node-pg-migrate up -m db/migrations
scripts.migrate:down: docker exec -it uniwork_server npx node-pg-migrate down -m db/migrations
scripts.migrate:down:all: docker exec -it uniwork_server npx node-pg-migrate down -m db/migrations -- 0
scripts.seed:dev: docker exec -it uniwork_server node tools/seed.js dev
scripts.seed:prod: docker exec -it uniwork_server node tools/seed.js prod
